Introduction
This topic provides an overview of processing physical mail received in an RO mailroom, including
sources of physical mail received at the RO
separating and routing physical mail
shipping mail to scanning vendors
, and
proper identification of undeliverable mail containingÂ Federal tax information (FTI)
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A - Centralized Mail (CM) Intake
citation: Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A
